articles.title: YouTube on Android now lets you watch 4K videos on FHD screens - SlashGear
articles.description: YouTube seems to have quietly rolled out the option to watch 4K/60p videos on any mobile device even if it doesn’t have an Ultra HD display. Though you won’t get quite the same visual q…
